main.text:
We are a local group for Free Code Camp: an open source community that helps you learn to code.

We are open to whoever wants to learn with Free Code Camp which currently focuses on full stack JavaScript development.

We organise regular meet-ups to encourage and support each other through the Free Code Camp curriculum.
main.fbText: So if you are looking for a study group or someone to pair programming on FCC challenges with - join the discussion on our group
main.skillsMatterText:
Currently our meet-ups are hosted by:
Skills Matter | CodeNode,
10 South Place, London,
EC2M 7EB, GB
If you wish to take part at our meet-ups please endure your place registering at FCC LND @ Skills Matter

campers.bio: Hi I'm Chris, I have been learning with Free Code Camp since April 2015 and I hope to find a programming job by the end of 2016.
